papers.title: Challenges for Circular e+e− Colliders
authors: This paper sketches the glorious past and the tantalizing future of circular e+e− colliders
highlighting some of the key issues.

papers.title: Physics at Future Colliders
papers.abstract: The physics program at the Future Circular Colliders is summarised. The synergy and complementarity between the leptonic FCC-ee collider and the hadronic FCC-hh collider are discussed. The foreseen improvements on Higgs measurements are presented using the data from both the leptonic and the hadronic FCC machines . The improvements obtainable on several searches for physics beyond SM are discussed. The possibilities presented by the FCC-eh machine are also briefly shown. reference for this paper using
